entry.title: Personalized Princess Moon Glow
entry.s:type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
Price: 33.99

NEW(Limited Edition) - Leyadoll Personalized Princess Moon Glow with Gift Bag

Personalized Doll with your baby's name! Now Available with Limited Stocks! 

About her: Princess Moon Glow, or you can call her Lady Moon Glow, is designed with awareness of Albinism. Her hair and skin white as snow display the unique beauty and elegance inside her. Swan is her favorite creature in the world because they have everything in common, such as hair colors and affections for night sky. 

Her favorite quote: We are destined to glow like the moon.

This Leyadoll would be a perfect gift with great educational benefits to help understand and support uncommon illnesses.

 Leyadoll Princess Moon Glow is every baby’s dream toy to have. With her signature smile, swan print dress & crown headwear, and ultra-soft features, it is without question the perfect doll for your baby to cuddle, play and grow up with. She will be your perfect gift for your daughter/granddaughter/niece for her birthday / Christmas gift / Baby shower gift / Easter gift / any occasion.

Materials

Our Princess Moon Glow is uniquely crafted with high-quality environmental materials for lasting value. We create our dolls out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush, and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton. With this perfect combination of materials, our dolls have the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.


As parents, you know very well that kids tend to be messy. That is why we designed our dolls to be completely machine-washable to save you the hassle. We provided you with everything you need to know about washing care on the doll’s tag for easy reference.

Craft

Size: 14 inches (36cm) in standing height and 6.3oz (178g) in weight. We strategically designed the doll’s arms and legs to be no bigger than 4cm, which is the perfect size for babies to grab and play with easily.

You can be confident in knowing that we develop our dolls with extremely proper care. During production, we ensure every seam is tight and impeccably stitched with cross-stitching on the inside to withstand your baby’s cute aggression.

Safety

We know the importance of safety, especially when it comes to your little one. We manufacture Leyadoll from the best and safest materials that comply with the applicable safety standards. We have successfully completed numerous safety tests involving compliance with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The tests we have passed are US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.

Personalized name dolls

One of the best features of our Leyadoll is that you have the ability to personalize her! Using up to 12 characters, you can place a name or any inscription to give the doll a unique identity. The material we use for lettering is safe and skin-friendly, just like the rest of the doll’s materials. Even with proper washings, the letters are durable enough to maintain color and sharpness.  


Free Gifts Included

Grab your limited time offer now! By purchasing our Cherry Leyadoll series, we will personalize your doll by adding your baby’s name completely free. In addition, you will also receive a free delicate Gift Bag, which makes our doll a perfect gift sent to anyone on any occasion!

There is nothing like that special connection between a baby and their first plush toy. We made this doll with the best quality materials while meeting the highest quality standards.  Designed specially to create lasting memories, you will be glad you purchased a Leyadoll for your little one.

Shipping & Delivery

Due to personalized Doll/Backpack require 1-2 business days to be produced, all orders will be dispatched from our warehouse within 3 business days of receipt.
We are proud to offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders, plus paid Express Couriers (DHL, FedEx) as an alternative option.

entry.title: Personalized Spring Girl - Yellow

entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
Price: 31.99

Personalized Leyadoll (Yellow) with Gift Bag

Gloveleya, also known as “Spring Girl”, is every baby’s dream toy to have. With her signature smile, embroidered flower dress, and ultra-soft features, it is without question this is the perfect doll for your baby to cuddle, play and grow up with.  

Materials

Our Gloveleya dolls are uniquely crafted with high-quality environmental materials for lasting value. We create our dolls out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton.  With this perfect combination of materials, our dolls have the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.

As parents, you know very well that kids tend to be messy.  That is why we designed our dolls to be completely washable to save you the hassle. We provided you with everything you need to know about washing care on the doll’s tag for easy reference.

Craft

Size: 16.5 inches (43cm) in standing height and 8oz (220g) in weight. We strategically designed the doll’s arms and legs to be no bigger than 4cm, which is the perfect size for babies to grab and play with easily.

You can be confident in knowing that we develop our dolls with extremely proper care. During production, we ensure every seam is tight and impeccably stitched with cross-stitching on the inside to withstand your baby’s cute aggression.

Safety 

We know the importance of safety, especially when it comes to your little one. We manufacture Gloveleya dolls from the best and safest materials that comply with the applicable safety standards. We have successfully completed numerous safety tests involving compliancy with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The tests we have passed are US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.

Personalized name dolls

One of the best features of our Gloveleya doll is that you have the ability to personalize her! Using up to 12 characters, you can place a name or any inscription to give the doll a unique identity. The material we use for lettering is safe and skin-friendly, just like the rest of the doll’s materials. Even with proper washings, the letters are durable enough to maintain color and sharpness.  

Free Gifts Included

Grab your limited time offer now! By purchasing our Gloveleya Spring Girl series, we will personalize your doll by adding your baby’s name completely free. In addition, you will also receive a free delicate Gift Bag, which makes our doll a perfect gift sent to anyone on any occasion!

There is nothing like that special connection between a baby and their first plush toy. We made this doll with the best quality materials while meeting the highest quality standards.  Designed specially to create lasting memories, you will be glad you purchased a Gloveleya doll for your little one.

Shipping & Delivery

Due to personalized Doll/Backpack require 1-2 business days to be produced, all orders will be dispatched from our warehouse within 3 business days of receipt.
We are proud to offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders, plus paid Express Couriers (DHL, FedEx) as an alternative option.
